sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addproduct, removeproduct } from '../Redux/productRedux' import './CSS/Sidepanel.css' // import { products } from '../Data' const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle={ //styling fontWeight:600 } // const [products,setProducts] = useState([]) let products = [] const dispatch = useDispatch(); function render(){ const brand = 'GANT' // setProducts() dispatch(addproduct({brand})) } useEffect(()=>{ const checkbox = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-checkbox') for(let check of checkbox){ check.addEventListener('click', function(e){ const brand = e.target.value if(e.target.checked === true){ dispatch(addproduct({brand})) console.log(brand) } else{ dispatch(removeproduct({brand})) } }) } }) return (
FILTERS
{/*styling*/}
BRAND
) } export default Sidepanel
